718075f-a.text:
28 Cannon Street, north east corner and Broome Street showing P.S. 110.

Board of Education, N.Y.C.

1920.
718075f-a.folder: Cannon Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

718080f-a.text:
Cannon Street, north from and including Broome Street. Also shown across the vacant lot at the S.W. corner, is Nos. 68-70 and a portion of No. 72 Broome Street, at adjoining and west of the N.W. corner of Cannon
Street.
February 12, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
718080f-a.folder: Cannon Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

717850f-a.text:
Broome Street, west from Cannon Street. Note the park in the right center (just beyond the solitary No. 82 Broome) where the north R. Hoe and Co. plant formerly stood. Barely discernible on the left is the modern apartment house facing on same.
NEG #3331  May 7, 1939
P. L. Sperr
717850f-a.folder: Broome Street & Cannon Street, Manhattan, NY

718079f-b.text:
Cannon Street, north from a point between Broome and
Delancey Streets and across the latter.
The Williamsburg Bridge is overhead and View No. 2 is from its base. Note the vacant lots at the N.E. and N. W. corners.
May 7, 1939
Views: 1 and 2
P. L. Sperr
718079f-b.folder: Cannon Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

718079f-a.text:
Cannon Street, north from a point between Broome and
Delancey Streets and across the latter.
The Williamsburg Bridge is overhead and View No. 2 is from its base. Note the vacant lots at the N.E. and N. W. corners.
May 7, 1939

718079f-a.folder: Cannon Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

718081f-a.text:
Cannon Street, south from Broome, to Grand Streets, where this thoroughfare terminates.  The buildings seen thru the center are on Jackson Street.  The utilitarian structure to the left of the same is Public School No. 12.  This is at the N.W. corner of the Madison Street.  Note in the foreground the cleared lots at the corners.  These have become typical of the effect of the enforcement of the fire and health provisions of the tenement house laws.

May 7, 1929
P.L. Sperr
718081f-a.folder: Cannon Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY
